typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cust_id as integer,
		cust_name as string,
		location as string,
		pin_code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadFiles
ReadFiles alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		cust_id as decimal(18,0),
		cust_name as string,
		location as string,
		pin_code as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['cust_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		cust_id,
		cust_name,
		location,
		pin_code
	)) ~> sink1
